title: Australia's Best: Music & Images of Australians in the 80's
other_title: Australias Best: Music and Images of Australians in the 1980's
Australias Best: Music and Images of Australians in the nineteen-eighties
creator_contributor_role: New South Wales Film Corporation, production company
subject_group: Music & Performing Arts/Rock music - History and criticism
description: A music video documentary showcasing the best of Australia's popular music in the eighties. Features the music of Split Enz, Australian Crawl, INXS, No Fixed Address, Cold Chisel and Icehouse. Includes interviews with celebrities such as Michael Hutchence, Neil and Tim Finn, James Reyne and Grace Knight.
active_carriers_public_types_and_formats: MOV file H264; ACMI Digital Access Copy - presentation
MOV file ProRes4444; Digital Preservation Master - presentation
